item.title: Jafar Panahi Named Asian Filmmaker of the Year at Busan International Film Festival
item.description: Jafar Panahi has been tapped for the Asian Filmmaker of the Year award at the 30th Busan International Film Festival, cementing the Iranian director’s status as one of cinema’s most defian

item.title: Jafar Panahi Named Asian Filmmaker of the Year at Busan International Film Festival
item.description: Jafar Panahi has been tapped for the Asian Filmmaker of the Year award at the 30th Busan International Film Festival, cementing the Iranian director’s status as one of cinema’s most defian

item.title: Busan Film Festival to Honor Jafar Panahi as Asian Filmmaker of the Year
item.description: The Busan award follows Panahi’s historic Palme d’Or win at Cannes in May for ‘It Was Just an Accident’ and caps a career defined by artistic resistance and critical acclaim.

item.title: Busan Film Festival to Honor Jafar Panahi as Asian Filmmaker of the Year
item.description: The Busan award follows Panahi’s historic Palme d’Or win at Cannes in May for ‘It Was Just an Accident’ and caps a career defined by artistic resistance and critical acclaim.
